full_text: Baar IN THE HIGH COURT OF KERALA AT ERNAKULAM 2020/KER/823 PRESENT THE HONOURABLE MR. JUSTICE ASHOK MENON WEDNESDAY, THE O8TH DAY OF JANUARY 2020 / 18TH POUSHA, 1941 Cri .MC.No.8639 OF 2019 (H) AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT IN CC 40/2014 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS -II,TRIVANDRUM CRIME NO.1711/2013 OF Peroorkada Police Station , Thiruvananthapuram PETITIONER/ACCUSED: VISHNU PRASAD AGED 28 YEARS S/O. RAVIKUMAR, DARSHANA HOUSE, KRWA 183, KAVALLUR KANJIRAMPATTA WARD, PEROORKADA 695 013. BY ADVS. SRI.RIJI RAJENDRAN SMT .MITHA SUDHINDRAN RESPONDENTS/DEFACTO COMPLAINANT & STATE: 1 MIKHIL MOHAN, S/O. MOHANAN PILLAI, PRATHEEKSHA BHAVAN, TC 5/154, HOUSE NO. 229, NEETHI NAGAR, PEROORKADA 695 005. 2 STATE OF KERALA, REPRESENTED BY PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM 682 031. R1 BY ADV. JINNU SARA GEORGE OTHER PRESENT: SRI.C.S.HRITHWIK SR PP THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 08.01.2020, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: ope Crl.MC.No.8639 OF 2019(H) 2020/KER/823 2 ORDER Dated this the 8th day of January, 2020 The petitioner is the sole accused in C.C No.40/2014 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-II, Thiruvananthapuram for having allegedly committed offences punishable under Section 380 of the IPC. The defacto complainant and the aggrieved is the 1** respondent who has appeared through counsel and filed an affidavit to the effect that he has no grievance against the petitioner and the matter has been amicably settled. A report also has been obtained from the Investigating Officer through the Senior Public Prosecutor. The petitioner has no criminal antecedents. There is no public interest involved. In the result, the Crl.M.C is allowed and the entire proceedings in C.C No.40/2014 on the files of the Judicial First Class Magistrate Court-II, Thiruvananthapuram stands quashed under Section 482 Cr.P.C and the accused is discharged. Sd/- ASHOK MENON JUDGE NR/08/01/20 Ce Beat Cr1.MC.No.8639 OF 2019(H) 2020/KER/S23 3 APPENDIX PETITIONER'S EXHIBITS: ANNEXURE A TRUE COPY OF THE FIR AND FIS IN CRIME NO. 1711/2013 OF PEROROORKADA POLICE STATION, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM DISTRICT. ANNEXURE B TRUE COPY OF THE FINAL REPORT IN CC NO. 40/2014 PENDING ON THE FILES OF THE COURT OF THE JUDICIAL FIRST CLASS MAGISTRATE II, THIRUVANANTHAPURAM DISTRICT. ANNEXURE C THE AFFIDAVIT FIELD BY THE DE-FACTO COMPLAINANT CONTAINING THE FACTUM OF SETTLEMENT OF THE ISSUE. RESPONDENTS' EXHIBITS: NIL //TRUE COPY// PA TO JUDGE
